summary: It's been a while since I last showed off my home screens.  I wanted to do something different this time.  Since July, I have gotten fed up with the direction of the big two computer OS people, so I moved to Arch Linux, and it’s been pretty nice...

summary: I've had my eye on Setapp since it launched in 2017 but it's never been the right time for me to jump in. until this week.  I really wanted to use Godspeed which is on Setapp (as well as having a standalone subscription) so I did some calculations to see if it was worth it...
title: Using Setapp
